title: 129: Top 3 Kwik Tips to Master Your Habits
description:
How do you master your habits?

First, you create your habits; then your habits create you. That’s the subject of this episode.

The treasures you seek in your life and learning is hidden in your daily routine. But how do you create a brand new habit? How do you stop the habit that holds you back?

In this episode, we have 3 experts to share their top tips and techniques to master your habits fast. 

** Do you want to stay up to date with every new episode and get my brand new Kwik Brain Accelerator Program? Go to www.KwikBrain.com/podcast to get instant access. **
